docs/solidity/compiler/remix.sol.content:
/*
Use
_______________________
Remix is recommended for deploying small contracts and learning Solidity.
It is also convenient to test nightly builds without installing multiple versions.

Installation
_______________________
Remix can be accessed online at https://remix.ethereum.org/ or
it can be installed https://github.com/ethereum/remix-live/tree/gh-pages#readme.

Command-Line Compiler
_______________________
For large contracts a command-line compiler is suggested, it also gives more 
compilation options.
*/
